subject: Steroids
Doping (Sports)
Shot Put
Athletics and Sports
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Andreas Krieger won the gold medal in the shot put at the 1986 European Championship when he competed as Heidi Krieger for East Germany.
snippet: Andreas Krieger won the gold medal in the shot put at the 1986 European Championship when he competed as Heidi Krieger for East Germany.
